example: For n = 3, the unique solution is 1 + 2 = 3.
program: (PARI) nxyz(v,t)=local(n,r,x2); r=0; if(t==0,return(1)); for(i3=3*t,#v, n=v[i3]; for(i1=1,i3-2, x2=n-v[i1]; if(x2<=v[i1],break); for(i2=i1+1,i3-1, if(v[i2]>=x2, if(v[i2]==x2, r+=nxyz(vector(i3-3,k,v[if(k<i1,k,if(k<i2-1,k+1,k+2))]),t-1)); break)))); r
